name: Scary
description: Iron golems will attack you on sight, and villagers will have significantly higher prices when traded with.

actions.command: execute at @s as @e[type=villager,distance=..7] run data merge entity @s {Gossips:[{Target:[I;1,1,1,1],Type:'major_negative',Value:110}]}
execute at @s as @e[type=villager,distance=..7] run data modify entity @s Gossips[{Target:[I;1,1,1,1]}].Target set from entity @p[tag=Puppeteer] UUID
execute at @s as @e[type=minecraft:iron_golem,distance=..10] run data modify entity @s AngryAt set from entity @p[tag=Puppeteer] UUID
execute at @s as @e[type=minecraft:iron_golem,distance=..10] run data modify entity @s AngerTime set value 60
execute at @s as @e[type=minecraft:iron_golem,distance=10..20] run data modify entity @s AngryAt set from entity @s UUID
execute at @s as @e[type=minecraft:iron_golem,distance=10..20] run data modify entity @s AngerTime set value 0
